entry.title: Hacker Spotlight: Kresten Krab Thorup
entry.content:
In a prior post I discussed the hacker culture. Recently I came across an excellent example of a hacker. In this video about using visualization to learn about what is going on within an Erlang VM, Kresten demonstrates the true hacker spirit. I look back at my past post and feel somewhat embarassed. I look back at the top four things I say make up a hacker and feel like I missed the ball on the meaning of Christmas.

A true hacker is driven by the curiosity and love of hacking (coding). The drive to learn and build.

Here’s to you, true hacker.

Original YouTube page. Follow the link, subscribe, thumb up and enjoy. Embedded below for convenience.

Hope you enjoyed the show. Now go give this guy some +1 lovin.
